p: Apart from its effective antibacterial property, honey possesses antifungal and antiviral properties. Tualang honey administration, especially at 40 and 60 g daily doses for 6 months in patients with asymptomatic human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), was shown to reduce viral load and improve their CD4 counts and quality of life [ 92]. Pediococcus acidilactici, a lactic acid bacteria strain, was isolated from Tualang honey and possessed antifungal activity against pathogenic Candida species [ 93].
